tool_description: Get all manga details and MANGA CHAPTERS!!
name: MangaAll
title: MangaAll

api_list.name: Get manga chapter by id
api_list.description:
Get manga chapter images by manga id and chapter id
Images are base64 format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mangaall.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/manga/getImages/2toxx*35S;xMndr980474/chapter-179.2"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mangaall.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search manga by name
